root.name: Brave Story: New Traveler
root.description: main artworkThe story revolves around protagonist Tatsuya who's friend Miki falls into a deep coma, his quest is to bring her back. The game plays like any traditional RPG with a turn-based battle-system. Although you meet many characters, your party is always limited to three members.
